module.description: Call Data Record report tools for viewing reports of your calls
module.name: CDR Reports
module.changelog: *2.10.0.8* #8845 SQL Injection Vulnerability *2.10.0.7* #5910 *2.10.0.6* #5788 install script *2.10.0.5* #5788 *2.10.0.4* formatting tweaks *2.10.0.3* #5500 *2.10.0.2* #5478, $5479 *2.10.0.1* add call recordings to CDR *2.10.0.0* #1426 *2.10.0.beta4* Bug fixes, re-categorizations *2.10.0.beta3* Speed up download of csv *2.10.0.beta2* Bug fixes *2.10.0.beta1* Play recorded files *2.10.0.alpha6* Bug fix in recordings settings *2.10.0.alpha5* Added localization *2.10.0.alpha4* Added csv export *2.10.0.alpha3* First public release *2.10.0.alpha2* Not released to public *2.10.0.alpha1* Not released to public *2.10.0.alpha0* Not released to public
